name: OTI Blade
description:
In this game, you are a Beyblade player who is competing against the others. Aim and shoot your Beyblade, hit theirs until it's stopped, and you win!

- Use your mouse to point to where you want to shoot

- While aiming, you can hold 'A' or 'D' to determine your trajectory curve

- Left click to shoot!

- After landing, you can use 'WASD' to slightly bend your Beyblade's movement.
